Sentencas: The electrical resistance of ferritic stainless steel 430 (SS430), which is used as an interconnect in solid oxide fuel cells for intermediate temperature operation, was improved by coating it with a protective thin layer.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Inconel, La0.6Sr0.4CoO3, and La0.6Sr0.4CrO3 (LSCr) were used as the coating material.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Each material was thinly coated on SS430 by using a radio frequency magnetron sputtering method.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: LSCr-coated SS430 showed the lowest electrical resistance, reducing the resistance to 1/3 of the uncoated SS430.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Long-term durability test performed at 700 degrees C for 1000 h showed that the LSCr layer also reduced the oxidation rate because the LSCr perovskite was formed and maintained throughout the measurement.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This was verified by X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, the uncoated SS430 formed spinel structures, such as Mn3-xCrxO4, at the surface.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Oxidative properties of the uncoated SS430 were inferior to the coated SS430 metals because the spinel structure has a relatively high oxidation rate and low electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells
Oxidation-resistant thin film coating on ferritic stainless steel by sputtering for solid oxide fuel cells
